sfftk-rw
  • Welcome to sfftk-rw’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to sfftk-rw’s documentation!

Note

Looking to convert other segmentation file formats to EMDB-SFF? Then checkout the sfftk package. Also, checkout the Segmentation Annotation Tool for the online version.

Note

Integrating sfftk-rw?

If you would like to integrate sfftk-rw into your software please feel free to get in touch through Github. We are very eager to help you out.
